DocAttribute.Name: AssemblyPlace
DocAttribute.Documentation: A designation of where the assembly is intended to take place defined by an Enum.

DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Predefined generic types for a element assembly that are specified in an enumeration.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType shall be given, if the predefined type is set to USERDEFINED.
